description.en: Using 'even' before main verbs and auxiliaries.
description.es: Usar 'even' antes de los verbos principales y auxiliares.

exercises.prompt: John habla muchos idiomas. Incluso habla polaco.
exercises.solution: John speaks many languages. He even speaks Polish.

exercises.prompt: Está lloviendo hoy en todas partes. Incluso está lloviendo en Sevilla.
exercises.solution: It's raining everywhere today. It's even raining in Seville.
